snippet: A self-portrait by Rembrandt, never before exhibited in this country, is on view at the Metropolitan Museum for the next several weeks.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibition Rembrandt at Work: The Great Self-Portrait From Kenwood House, featuring a painting by Rembrandt never before exhibited in the United States, at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: A self-portrait by Rembrandt, never before exhibited in this country, is on view at the Metropolitan Museum for the next several weeks.

headline.main: You Can Almost Hear Him Sigh
headline.print_headline: You Can Almost Hear Him Sigh
